author: Special Correspondent
text:
‘Palpakki’ C. Krishnan, MLA, flagged off the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus services in three new routes in Omalur block on Sunday.

Nalukkal bridge in Sarkaraisettipatti panchayat to Salem city via Vellalapatti; from Senaigoundanur village in Moongilpadi panchayat to Salem city; and from Omalur town to Salem city via Maattukaranur, Sangeethpatti, Karuppur villages were the new routes on which the bus services were flagged off. The TNSTC has also decided to operate additional trip of the bus service from Omalur to Salem city via Molandipatti, Kullagoundanur. Mr. Krishnan flagged off this additional trip service too.
title: Three bus services flagged off
